impact.title: Value chain transformation
impact.desc: We invest to improve people’s lives, from our employees to all those who touch our business system, to our investors, to the broad communities we call home.

impact.title: Focusing on a world without waste
impact.desc: The global initiative launched in 2018 focuses on designing, collecting and partnering. Making all our packaging more sustainable and 100% recyclable globally by 2025 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging by 2030.

impact.title: Water stewardship
impact.desc: Through our strategy of ‘Reduce, Recycle and Replenish’, we exceeded our 2020 replenish goal - our water usage ratio was 1.73 liters of water per litre of beverage produced – a reduction of 32.4% since 2010. Water replenishment ratio of 159.9%.

impact.title: Fruit circular economy
impact.desc: Fruit Circular Economy starts with the Unnati program, which is farm-level productivity enhancement by creating a belief among farmers in using Ultra-high to high density fruit plantation coupled with modern Package of Practices (POP). This efficient use of input materials help in more than doubling the fruit produce.

impact.title: Responsible business
impact.desc: Make 100% of our packaging recyclable globally by 2025— and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging by 2030.
